about_the_game:
“MindLift” is a challenging platformer where players guide a protagonist trapped in a coma through their subconscious world. To return to reality, the protagonist must collect fragments of their memories while ascending a series of dynamic 2D and 3D landscapes filled with moving platforms and unpredictable obstacles. The journey culminates in finding the final memory, unlocking the path back to life.


• Challenging Gameplay

• Navigate ever-shifting platforms and overcome obstacles requiring precise jumps and quick reflexes in a gameplay style inspired by “only-up” mechanics.

• Memory Collection Narrative

• Gather memory fragments to piece together the protagonist’s story, uncovering their past and the meaning of their journey.

• Stunning Visual Diversity

• Experience a blend of surreal 2D and 3D environments, each representing a unique aspect of the protagonist’s inner world.

• Immersive Sound and Atmosphere

• Engage with a richly designed soundtrack and evocative visuals that bring the subconscious world to life.


“MindLift” is more than just a game—it’s a journey of discovery, perseverance, and self-reflection. Players will guide the protagonist through an emotional narrative, overcoming challenges that symbolize the struggle to reclaim lost memories and regain control of their life.

Take on the challenge and explore the depths of the subconscious. Collect every memory fragment, rise to the top, and shape your own ending in “MindLift.”
